title: Original Hard Mode
description:
Original difficulty settings for the Hard mode as they were at launch.

Feature:
- Set Your Own Difficulty with SYOD.INI file.

Thank you Krishna M. for this beautiful image https://krishnadraws.artstation.com/projects/reR06

SYOD.INI file can be found in:
- C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\1213210\2139083900\Original Hard Mode\CCDATA\

Origin installation (manual download):
https://github.com/EternalNooblet/CnC_Remastered_Collection/tree/nooblet#origin
